subject: Queen Anne Stakes (Horse Race)
Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Verrazano, who began his career in the United States, is continuing his shift from dirt to turf at the Queen Anne Stakes at Royal Ascot on Tuesday.
snippet: Verrazano, who began his career in the United States, is continuing his shift from dirt to turf at the Queen Anne Stakes at Royal Ascot on Tuesday.
